_header: As I me rode this ender day / By green wood to seek play
_description: A song of the Five Joys of the Virgin Mary — ten 6-line stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Ase y me rod þis ender dayby grene wode to seche
                    play…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…In þis world to ben holyant wynne heuene
                    blysse
